text.Words: Andruss: Toast! What is going on here!?
Toasterman: I just experienced the most terrifying experience of my 297 year existence.
Andruss: With the scrap machines and the white goo?
Toasterman: Yes, and this has certainly reinvigorated some concern the Boss has threatened with me before.
Andruss: Look Toast I'm not gonna let him do anything to you
Toasterman: He holds the company power, we do not.
Andruss: We can try what we can with this! I'll see if I can sweet talk him should anything happen. I promise!
Toasterman: I thank you for your kindness, but we have the future to tackle at the moment.
Toasterman: Whatever this substance is, it's certainly bent on destruction and assimilation of all materials. So how do we tackle it?
Andruss: I think the attacks you've been doing have been helping us out! If we keep going like this we may just avoid an apocalypse in the Breadland System!
Toasterman: I believe this may be a viable strategy, but unauthorised ship usage could send me the same way as the ones I just fought.
Andruss: I can try and distract him with other things while you do that!
Toasterman: Hopefully we can get rid of this stuff, but it seems to be growing in power as we move.
Andruss: Let's get this stuff gone then!
Andruss: I'll see you back at base, Toastyboi!
